Class PointerUpBinder

Namespace
FastenUp.Runtime.Binders.Pointers
Assembly
FastenUp.Runtime.dll

This class is used to bind to the UnityEngine.EventSystems.IPointerUpHandler interface.

[RequireComponent(typeof(PointerDownBinder))]
[AddComponentMenu("UI/Fasten Up/Event System Handlers/Pointer Up Binder", 5)]
[HelpURL("https://github.com/MerlinDS/fasten-up/wiki/Binders#pointerup")]
public sealed class PointerUpBinder : PointerBinder, IEventBinder<UnityAction>, IEventBinder<UnityAction<PointerEventData>>, IBinder
